name: Instrumage
description:
This game was made in 72 hours for #MagaraJam4.

Your superpower is your talents in playing instruments. Play your instruments to defeat your enemies and protect your love, the last drummer.

You two are the last musicians alive in this demolished world. You are trying to protect the music in the world against the hostiles. Use the power of music and love to defeat them.

Every correct combination casts a spell by using musical notes. Your spells will consume your mana points. Faster you cast the spell, less mana it consumes. 

Team and Development Process:

We are a team with 4 students which work on different areas;

- Baran INCE             -M. Enes UNAL

- Ismet KILINC         -Ogehan Gucay GUL

We developed this game on Unity with our own scripts, drawings, music, sound effects and some free assets.

Used Assets:

Unity Particle Pack.
